alert.note: Alert for Rock; Walworth (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 17 at 5:26AM CDT until August 17 at 6:00AM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Milwaukee/Sullivan has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Walworth County in southeastern Wisconsin... Southeastern Rock County in south central Wisconsin... * Until 600 AM CDT. * At 525 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Beloit, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Beloit, Delavan, Lake Geneva, Williams Bay, Genoa City, Walworth, Clinton, Fontana-On-Geneva Lake, Sharon, Darien, Como, Pell Lake, Powers Lake, Bohners Lake, Burlington, Springfield, Allens Grove, Shopiere, Delavan Lake, and Foxhollow. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
